name: Brittny Davis
text: Normally it's pretty good. Service is however very slow. Last night I ordered a pizza online at10pm. A little after 11 my pizza still had not arrived. I called the location and was told that they were now closed and the driver was still out â€¦More

name: Johanna Brown
text: The staff was really nice and helpful. The pizza was good. The location was a little grimy.

name: Shaun Williams
text: Very bad service tables were filthy. Waited 10 minutes for somebody to finally greet me and when she did I was asked do you know what you want. I told her no because i hadnt looked at the menu. Decided to go somewhere else. They seem to be more focused on carry out and delivery. Heed the other reviews and avoid this location.

name: Michael Frye
text: Wonderful food and good service despite there being a full on yelling argument in the back. It was kinda funny but they still worked around it, the employees.

name: Whitney Phillips
text: I ordered a 8 pieces of bone out wings and fries but no ranch dip and fries are small. Delivery was late.

name: Steve Garcia
text: They just hang up on u terrible service

name: Leenez Bailey
text: Very slow and kept me on hold till closing

name: Shannon Fraiser
text: sec time i went was horrible got order wrong was very rude will never go back!!!!!!!!!
